response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its immense value, it is worth $1,200,000 to us. However, I understand the importance of negotiation and am willing to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time, I am offering this exceptional product at a discounted price of $1,080,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the immense value it holds for you. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1080000}
